text: Nelson Azevedo-Janelas (born 12 February 1998) is a Belgian footballer who is currently a free agent. ==International career== Azevedo-Janelas was born in Belgium and is of Portuguese descent. He was a youth international for Belgium. ==References== ==External links== * *Belgium Stats at Belgian FA Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgium youth international footballers Category:Belgian people of Portuguese descent Category:R.S.C. title: Nelson Azevedo-Janelas
